com.github.triceo.splitlog.api

Interface MessageMetricProducer

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Follower, LogWatch, MessageSource

    public interface MessageMetricProducer
    Implementors of this interface provide users with means of measuring various properties of Messages that pass through them.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MessageMetric<? extends Number> getMetric(String id)
      Retrieve the metric for a particular ID.

    • Method Detail

      • getMetric

        MessageMetric<? extends Number> getMetric(String id)
        Retrieve the metric for a particular ID.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID under which the metric has been requested in startMeasuring(MessageMeasure, String).
        Returns:
        Null if no such metric. Either not startMeasuring(MessageMeasure, String)'d or already stopMeasuring(MessageMetric)'d.

      • getMetricId

        String getMetricId(MessageMetric<? extends Number> measure)
        Retrieve the ID for a particular measure.
        Parameters:
        measure - The metric retrieved by startMeasuring(MessageMeasure, String).
        Returns:
        Null if no such metric. Either not startMeasuring(MessageMeasure, String)'d or already stopMeasuring(MessageMetric)'d.

      • isMeasuring

        boolean isMeasuring(MessageMetric<? extends Number> metric)
        Whether or not particular MessageMetric is active.
        Parameters:
        metric - Metric in question.
        Returns:
        True after startMeasuring(MessageMeasure, String) has been called and before stopMeasuring(MessageMetric).

      • isMeasuring

        boolean isMeasuring(String id)
        Whether or not particular MessageMetric is active.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the metric in question.
        Returns:
        True after startMeasuring(MessageMeasure, String) has been called and before stopMeasuring(String).

      • startMeasuring

        <T extends Number> MessageMetric<T> startMeasuring(MessageMeasure<T> measure,
                                                 String id)
        Request that a message property be tracked from now on.
        Parameters:
        measure - The class that measures the given property. It is highly recommended that a measure instance be exclusive to each metric.
        id - Unique identifier by which to locate the metric later.
        Returns:
        The metric to query for the value of the given property.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - When a given ID has already been passed to startMeasuring(MessageMeasure, String) and not to stopMeasuring(String) or equivalents.

      • stopMeasuring

        boolean stopMeasuring(MessageMetric<? extends Number> metric)
        Will stop the metric from being notified of new Messages. From this point on, the ID will become available for taking.
        Parameters:
        metric - The metric in question.
        Returns:
        True if stopped, false if unknown.

      • stopMeasuring

        boolean stopMeasuring(String id)
        Will stop the metric from being notified of new Messages. From this point on, the ID will become available for taking.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the metric in question.
        Returns:
        True if stopped, false if unknown.
